message_1:
Suppose there are five cities (A, B, C, D, E) that need to be connected by a network of roads. The distances between each pair of cities are given in the following table:

| Cities | A | B | C | D | E |
|--------|---|---|---|---|---|
| A      | 0 | 5 | 2 | 7 | 9 |
| B      | 5 | 0 | 1 | 4 | 3 |
| C      | 2 | 1 | 0 | 6 | 2 |
| D      | 7 | 4 | 6 | 0 | 5 |
| E      | 9 | 3 | 2 | 5 | 0 |

What is the minimum total distance required to connect all five cities, starting from city A and ending at city E?
